body_html: Here @asimshankar , added your recommendations! BTW, I lost an incredible amount of time trying to implement a minimalist markdown2javadoc conversion utility, I think it would better go with a third party library, there is a few (e.g. Discount). What do you think?

body: Here @asimshankar , added your recommendations! BTW, I lost an incredible amount of time trying to implement a minimalist *markdown2javadoc* conversion utility, I think it would better go with a third party library, there is a few (e.g. `Discount`). What do you think?
